item.title: This guy
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:8, topic:550759”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=669669.msg4477949#msg4477949 date=1427357686]

When you have that much cash, anything you touch is considered manipulation. He should be banned immediately. Merchers were making 100m a pop on elysians because of him rofl
[/quote]
Doesn’t make any sense, there is a buy limit. He’d have to spread the money across multiple accounts, and even then it would still throw up red flags to Jagex[/quote]

He bought 100k addy bars, dhide, mith bars, nests etcetc all from players last night.

Read full topic

item.title: This guy
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

When you have that much cash, anything you touch is considered manipulation. He should be banned immediately. Merchers were making 100m a pop on elysians because of him rofl

Doesn’t make any sense, there is a buy limit. He’d have to spread the money across multiple accounts, and even then it would still throw up red flags to Jagex

Read full topic

item.title: This guy
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:6, topic:550759”][quote author=Frell link=topic=669669.msg4477946#msg4477946 date=1427347825]

I looked at the stream for a little bit and he just had his GE open to show 6 stacks of monies? Is that all the stream was about or did I miss something?

This guy controls the market so it’s important to see what he is doing, but he is really picky. If he wanted to, he could make any item cost any price so it’s only important to keep informed. Elys were falling then they did a U turn to this guy rofl.

Jagex said they’ll ban any single person or clan that is involved in item manipulation
[/quote]

When you have that much cash, anything you touch is considered manipulation. He should be banned immediately. Merchers were making 100m a pop on elysians because of him rofl :)[/quote]

Banned because you have too much money? How could anybody ever reach that state lol

Read full topic
